title: Training completion certificates (safety, compliance, skills)
personalDataVerified: Trainee name, employer name, training course title, training date, instructor name, hours completed
personalDataVisible: Expiration status (if renewal required). Link to training provider system (employers and regulatory inspectors, requires authentication)
rationale: Regulatory compliance verification for workplace safety and compliance training. Employer verification of employee training records. Human-readable certificate format suitable for workplace display. Domain binding to training provider prevents fake certificates. Critical for OSHA and industry compliance where training records must be verified during inspections.
